about_the_game:
《Dark Door》 is a reasoning game developed by the Mallet Games, a studio composed of students from Bilibili.

Adapted from "It's Your Turn"
A variety of decryption experiences suitable for players around the world are waiting for you. [/h2]

· Silent music experience

Let you immerse yourself in its surroundings

· Real scene experience

Use Unreal Engine to Enhance Your Experience

· Unique plot

Unrealistic yet reasonable

· Passionate development team

Produced by a game studio composed of students from Bilibili

《Dark Door》 is adapted from the game 《It's Your Turn》

The design inspiration for the game "It's Your Turn" comes from the Japanese mystery drama of the same name. In the game, players will participate in a strange game about residents and solve puzzles through logical reasoning. The features of the game "It's Your Turn" include:
[/h2]

· Inference Elements: The game is full of reasoning elements, and players need to infer the truth of events by analyzing clues and evidence.
·Multiplayer gameplay: The game supports multiplayer online gameplay, allowing players to solve puzzles together with other players, increasing the interactivity and challenge of the game.
·Social function: The game also has a social function, allowing players to communicate and learn from reasoning enthusiasts from different regions, and jointly solve puzzles.
·Suitable for detective fans: For players who enjoy detective and puzzle solving, this game provides a great platform to exercise and showcase their reasoning skills.
Overall, 《It's Your Turn》 is a game that combines reasoning, leisure, and puzzle elements. It not only provides players with an entertainment experience, but also exercises their thinking and logical abilities. If you are a fan of mystery dramas or enjoy puzzle games, then "It's Your Turn" would be a good choice.


If you need a better gaming experience, you can come and play the game 《Dark Door》! [/h2]

《Dark Door》 takes advantage of the great advantages of the Unreal Engine to make a great adaptation and leap in the gaming experience of 《It's Your Turn》.


Off topic: 《It's Your Turn》 has received support and encouragement from multiple parties since its launch, and it also stopped serving once on the way before being released again. But contrary to expectations, it still ceased service at 0:00 on June 20, 2024.
Official announcement:
Dear residents
Thank you all for your continuous support and love for the 《It's Your Turn》 app.
Since its launch,《It's Your Turn》 has gained tens of thousands of players. It is precisely because of everyone's continuous participation that we have always had enough motivation to improve the gaming experience and improve the playability. We hope to explore new game modes with everyone.
It is an honor to join hands with all of you on this journey, and we also thank you for sharing and creating unforgettable memories with us. These are all our invaluable treasures. Once again, we extend our sincerest gratitude to everyone!
Due to considerations of the platform's operational strategy and overall operational situation, we regret to announce that the "It's Your Turn" APP will cease service at 0:00 on June 20, 2024 (after the end of this season). At that time, platform registration/login/gaming and other functions will no longer be available for use.
The specific schedule is as follows: Starting today, the "It's Your Turn" app will suspend game operation and updates, and the game can still be used normally
On June 20, 2024 at 0:00, the "It's Your Turn" APP server stopped serving

Thank you for your tolerance and support all along. We deeply apologize for any inconvenience caused by this adjustment! 🙇🏻‍♀️🙇🏻‍♂️
This time, I really said goodbye!
From: All members of the production team for 《It's Your Turn》

Mallet Games wanted this game to last forever, so we started the production of a remake of《It's Your Turn》 and renamed it 《Dark Door》
We hope to bring this game to people all over the world to play!
Please all residents fully enjoy the feast brought by Mallet Games!

legal_notice:
“Dark Door” legal statement
1. This game is a virtual world, and all items, characters, scenes, etc. in the game are virtual and do not have any actual value.
2. This game is for entertainment only, players should consume rationally, and shall not use the game for gambling and other illegal activities.
3. It is forbidden to use the game to engage in any form of fraud, fraud and other illegal activities. Once discovered, the account will be banned immediately.
4. Minors should use this game under the guidance of their guardians to avoid indulging in the game and affecting their normal study and life.
5. This game reserves the right to adjust the game rules, gameplay, activities, etc. Any changes will be announced in advance.
6. This game supervises the words, deeds and behaviors of players in the game, and any behavior that violates the rules of the game will be punished accordingly.
7. This game attaches great importance to the protection of players' personal information in the game, and will strictly abide by relevant laws and regulations to protect the privacy and security of players.
name: Dark Door

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor clocked at 2.5 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
